channel.title: MrGreeyne on 2021 Design Refresh
channel.description: Recent content in MrGreeyne on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: Introspection
item.description: Your browser does not support the audio element.Your browser does not support the audio element. Week 13: Look At Me. This art was lovingly created using: Keyboard, and some words.. Artist’s Notes The first thing I thought of when looking at the title of this week’s prompt was introspection. I wanted to explore poetry a bit more so I did some reading on limericks and worked with that structure. So the first one titled SeemsGood* is about my general high school experience.

item.title: Yesterday
item.description: Week 11: Atmosphere Spectrum. This art was lovingly created using: Few word. Artist’s Notes A smattering of haikus for my first (and late ehehe) design refresh. Enjoy! I mumble and groan Basking in her warm embrace Good morning, sunshine Just as the wind blows, As the clouds and trees just be, I think of nothing. Accompany me Ebony night, Lake Shore Drive What’s for dinner, beans? Unfathomable Magnificent, glorious Twinkling far away
